about_the_game:
Celebrate the treasured history of this classic strategy series with this 3-disc set, which features various song selections from the original 1991-1998 soundtracks.

Disc 1:
  1. Langrisser Theme – 1991
  2. Prologue – 1991
  3. Royal Knight – 1991
  4. Path of the Wind – 1991
  5. Encroaching Enemy – 1991
  6. Into the Fray – 1991
  7. Favorable Ending – 1991
  8. Bonus Track 2 – 1991
  9. Bonus Track 3 – 1991
  10. Langrisser Theme – 1993
  11. Prologue – 1993
  12. Kingdom Knight – 1993
  13. The Sacred Sword – 1993
  14. One with the Light – 1993
  15. Epilogue – 1993
  16. Don't Stop Your Dream – 1993
  17. Bonus Track – 1993
  18. Opening 1 – 1994
  19. Opening 2 – 1994
  20. Story – 1994
  21. Neo-Holy War – 1994
  22. Sword of Legend – 1994
  23. Final Battle – 1994
  24. Allies of Truth – 1994
  25. Bernhardt – 1994
  26. Enemy Reinforcements – 1994
  27. Requiem – 1994
  28. Aftermath – 1994
  29. Eternal Tale – 1994

Disc 2:
  1. Opening 1 – 1995
  2. Opening 2 – 1995
  3. Story – 1995
  4. Soldier – 1995
  5. Allies of Fate – 1995
  6. Leon – 1995

  8. Tale's End – 1995
  9. Credits – 1995

  18. Story – 1997
  19. Clashing Blades – 1997
  20. Final Battle – 1997
  21. Boser – 1997
  22. Bernhardt – 1997
  23. Eternal Tale – 1997
  24. Credits – 1997

Disc 3:
